value.title: StarCraft 2: SICK GAME - Has Dark SOLVED ZvT Late Game? (ByuN vs Dark)
value.excerpt: The Terran versus Zerg match up in StarCraft 2 seems to be Terran favoured in the late game. In this match of Dark versus ByuN, Dark (Zerg) decides to try out a Mass Brood Lord micro trick versus ByuN (Terran).
